item.description:
Greetings, fellow signers! 

Starting Thursday, November 24, 2011, there will be a new Meetup at the North Shore Mall food court location. We meet at the booths in front of the food court - from 6 p.m. to 8 p.m. Feel free to bring your books, your smart phone applications with signing lessons and don't forget your active, signing fingers! (address: 210 Andover St., Peabody, MA) 

Because ASL classes rotate as we climb the ladder of knowledge, a goodly number of our participants at the Wednesday night Meetup are starting ASL class on ... yup, you guessed it ... Wednesday nights. What to do, what to do? Thursday night! There's no such thing as too much practice, is there?

I want to add that Paul has an absolutely fabulous Wednesday night Meetup at the North Shore Mall - same time, same station, different night - that I highly recommend. Paul and all the folks at that Meetup are all just great! 

Look forward to seeing you there!

Feel free to email me through Meetup if you've any questions.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for people signing in the North Shore Mall food court!
item.name: Meet and Sign!
